key_risks: Financial downgrades and limited growth prospects
Reliance on external financing and interest rate sensitivity
controversies: Customer service complaints and unresolved maintenance issues
Negative reviews on BBB and apartment rating sites
environmental_issues: Limited transparency on measurable ESG outcomes
social_issues: Tenant dissatisfaction and poor property management
governance_issues: Lack of robust ESG impact reporting
